harvested_crops.name: Blue Jazz
harvested_crops.description: A spring flower that blooms in vibrant blue.

harvested_crops.name: Carrot
harvested_crops.description: A crunchy orange root vegetable.

harvested_crops.name: Cauliflower
harvested_crops.description: A large, white vegetable with a unique texture.

harvested_crops.name: Coffee Bean
harvested_crops.description: Plant in spring or summer to grow a coffee plant. Place five in a keg to make coffee.

harvested_crops.name: Garlic
harvested_crops.description: A pungent bulb with many culinary uses.

harvested_crops.name: Green Bean
harvested_crops.description: A crunchy legume.

harvested_crops.name: Kale
harvested_crops.description: A leafy green vegetable packed with nutrients.

harvested_crops.name: Parsnip
harvested_crops.description: A hardy root vegetable with a sweet, nutty flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Potato
harvested_crops.description: A widely cultivated tuber.

harvested_crops.name: Rhubarb
harvested_crops.description: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.

harvested_crops.name: Strawberry
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, juicy favorite with an appealing red color.

harvested_crops.name: Tulip
harvested_crops.description: A cheerful spring flower.

harvested_crops.name: Unmilled Rice
harvested_crops.description: Rice in its natural state. Must be processed to be edible.

harvested_crops.name: Blueberry
harvested_crops.description: A popular berry reported to have many health benefits.

harvested_crops.name: Corn
harvested_crops.description: One of the most popular grains.

harvested_crops.name: Hops
harvested_crops.description: Used to brew beer.

harvested_crops.name: Hot Pepper
harvested_crops.description: Fiery hot!

harvested_crops.name: Melon
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, refreshing summer treat.

harvested_crops.name: Poppy
harvested_crops.description: A bright red flower with a strong aroma.

harvested_crops.name: Radish
harvested_crops.description: A crunchy root vegetable with a peppery bite.

harvested_crops.name: Red Cabbage
harvested_crops.description: Often used in salads and coleslaws.

harvested_crops.name: Starfruit
harvested_crops.description: An extremely juicy fruit that grows in hot, humid weather.

harvested_crops.name: Summer Spangle
harvested_crops.description: A tropical bloom that thrives in the humid summer air.

harvested_crops.name: Summer Squash
harvested_crops.description: A crisp and mildly sweet vegetable.

harvested_crops.name: Sunflower
harvested_crops.description: A tall, bright flower that's said to track the sun's movement.

harvested_crops.name: Tomato
harvested_crops.description: Rich and slightly tangy, the Tomato has a wide variety of culinary uses.

harvested_crops.name: Wheat
harvested_crops.description: One of the most widely cultivated grains.

harvested_crops.name: Amaranth
harvested_crops.description: A purple grain cultivated by an ancient civilization.

harvested_crops.name: Artichoke
harvested_crops.description: The bud of a thistle plant.

harvested_crops.name: Beet
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, earthy root vegetable.

harvested_crops.name: Bok Choy
harvested_crops.description: A leafy green vegetable.

harvested_crops.name: Broccoli
harvested_crops.description: A nutritious and hardy vegetable.

harvested_crops.name: Cranberries
harvested_crops.description: These tart red berries are a traditional winter food.

harvested_crops.name: Eggplant
harvested_crops.description: A rich, purple vegetable.

harvested_crops.name: Fairy Rose
harvested_crops.description: An enchanted rose that smells like honey.

harvested_crops.name: Grape
harvested_crops.description: A sweet cluster of fruit.

harvested_crops.name: Pumpkin
harvested_crops.description: A fall favorite, grown for the festivities of the season.

harvested_crops.name: Yam
harvested_crops.description: A starchy tuber with a lot of culinary versatility.

harvested_crops.name: Sweet Gem Berry
harvested_crops.description: It's by far the sweetest thing you've ever smelled.

harvested_crops.name: Powdermelon
harvested_crops.description: A winter melon that grows in the cold.

harvested_crops.name: Ancient Fruit
harvested_crops.description: It's been dormant for eons.
